layout.name: dest
layout.title: Destination
layout.tooltip: The name of the destination for the electric ball

layout.name: onTime
layout.title: On Time
layout.tooltip: Amount of frames the head stays on.

layout.name: offTime
layout.title: Off Time
layout.tooltip: Amount of frames the head stays off. If this is 0, it will never automatically power on. Only useful for starting chains

layout.name: elecSpeed
layout.title: Electric Ball Speed
layout.tooltip: The speed of the output electric ball

layout.name: electric
layout.title: Begin On?
layout.tooltip: If checked, the tesla head begins activated.
